Description.Text: The Majestic Mirage Club is an Adults only hotel located in Punta Cana, Dominica Republic. The hotel features free WiFi, a restaurant and a year-round outdoor pool, Majestic Mirage Punta Cana offers accommodations in Punta Cana, just 16 miles from freshwater lagoons. There is a restaurant and bar and guests can have fun at the casino and game room. Free private parking is available on site.Every room at this resort is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms include views of the pool or garden. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Superior rooms have a spa tub or a hot tub.There is a 24-hour front desk, babysitting services, a hairdresser's, and a gift shop at the property.The area is popular for golfing and horseback riding. Cap Cana Marina is 17 miles from Majestic Mirage Punta Cana, and Playa Juanillo is 17 miles away. The nearest airport is Punta Cana Airport, 13 miles from the property.
